name: CBD Anti Ageing Intensive Day Cream
description: CBD Anti aging intensive day cream is carefully formulated to protect and repair the skin,with a range of vitamins, oils and natural extracts combined instantly firms and hydrates, making the skin feel healthy and youthful.
ingredients: Aqua,Persea Gratissima oil,Cetearyl alcohol & Polysorbate 60,Helianthus Annuus,Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil, Glycerine (Veg),Olea Europaea Oil,Cocos Nucifera Oil,Butyrospermum Parkii,Phenoxyethanol & Ethylhexylglycerin,Stearic acid,Zinc oxide, Allantoin,Avena sativa meal extract,a-Tocopherol,Sodium hyaluronate,Xanthan gum,Propylene glycol,Camellia Sinensis Leaf, Phenoxyethanol, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil,Cannabidiol. For all skin Types, Suitable for Vegetarians and Vegans cruelty free.

name: CBD Hydro Rescue Night Moisturiser

Rosehip oil - nourish repair & regenerate. Primrose oil- anti inflammatory, moisturising, cure eczema. Cannabidiol- conditioning. Oat silk- softens, creates a protective film on the skin. Avocado oil- anti aging & anti inflammatory. Apricot kernal oil- condtioning, anti aging, anti inflammatory.
ingredients: Aqua,Cetearyl Alcohol & polysorbate 60,Persea Gratissima oil, Prunus armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil,Butyrospermum parkii,Glycerine(Veg),Helianthus Annuus,Olea Europaea oil,Cocos Nucifera Oil,Phenoxyethanol & Ethylhexylglycerin,Steric acid,Allantoin,Avena sativa meal extract,α-Tocopherol, Sodium Hyaluronate,Xanthan gum,Oenothera Biennis Oil,Rosa Canina Fruit oil,Cannabidiol. name: CBD Face Serum

name: Charcoal Dough Cleanser
ingredients: Kaolin (White Kaolin Clay), Glycerin (Vegetable), Prunus Dulcis (Almond) Meal, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Flour, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Extract, Citrus Sinensis (Sweet Orange) Oil, Boswellia Serrata (Frankincense) Oil, Charcoal Powder (Activated Charcoal), Citral, Limonene, Linalool
